a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Happiness inequality during periods of economic growth, 1981 to 2007
Happiness inequality is expressed as the standard deviation in self-reported happiness. Lower values indicate
less happiness inequality in a country.
Data source: Clark, Flèche & Senik – Happiness Inequality
